Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
    Food
    Interface for food items.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ammo
    An abstract class for Ammo which is a type of Item that is used by Gun.
    AmmunitionBag
    An immovable item that collects ammo for the player,
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    Arm
    A type of upgradable weapon.
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    CoinPouch
    An immovable item that collects coins for the player,
    CraftWeaponAction
    Craft a primitive weapon such as arm and leg into a superior weapon only if the weapon is an upgradable weapon.
    CrippledBehaviour
    Returns a DoNothingAction in alternating turn if the zombie only has one leg, or every turn if zombie has no leg
    Crop
    A class that represents crops that turns into a ripe crop.
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    EatAction
    Action that allows actor to consume Food
    EnterVehicleAction
    An action that checks if the player has the key required to unlock the vehicle, and move the actor to the location of the vehicle if the player has the key.
    FarmBehaviour
    A class that allows Farmer to interact with Crops.
    Farmer
    Class representing a farmer.
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FertiliseAction
    Special Action for Actors to fertilise Crops
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    FoodItem
    Class representing items that can be used as a food.
    GameSettings
    Set up the game
    Gun
    An abstract class for Guns which is also a type of weapon.
    HarvestAction
    Special Action for Actors to harvest Ripe Crops
    Helicopter
    An immovable item that cannot be picked up or dropped and allows the player to move between maps.
    Helipad
    A ground where a helicopter lands, holds a list of keys required to enter the helicopter, will move the player to the location of this helipad if the player has the corresponding key to unlock the helicopter.
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HumanCorpse
    Class that represent HumanCorpse
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    ImmovableItem
    Represents an item that cannot be picked up, but has the option to be dropped.
    Leg
    A type of upgradable weapon.
    MamboMarie
    A Mambo Marie is created with the ability to wander around and spawn zombie
    NewWorld  
    PickUpAmmoAction
    An action that adds the ammo on the ground to the player's AmmunitionBag then remove the ammo from the map.
    PickUpCoinAction
    An action that adds the coins on the ground to the player's coin pouch then remove the coins from the map.
    PickUpWeaponBehaviour
    A class that generate a pickUpItemAction if the item is portable and can be weaponized.
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    ShootAction
    An action for using shotgun and sniper
    Shotgun
    A class representing Shotgun that extends Super class Guns which is also a type of weapon.
    ShotgunAmmo
    A class for ShotGunAmmo which is a type of Ammo that is required to used Shotgun weapon.
    ShoutAction
    An Action that makes Actor shout.
    ShoutBehaviour
    A class that has 10% to generate ShoutAction
    Sniper
    A class representing Sniper that extends Super class Guns which is also a type of weapon.
    SniperAmmo
    A class for SniperAmmo which is a type of Ammo that is required to used Sniper weapon.
    SowAction
    Special class that allows actor to sow Crops
    SpawnZombieAction
    Special Action that allows Actors to spawn zombies.
    SpawnZombieBehaviour
    A class that generates a SpawnZombieAction every 10 turns after it is appeared
    TerminateAction
    Special Action that allows Actors to terminate game.
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    UpgradableWeapon
    An abstract class for zombie's limb which is also a type of weapon.
    VisitShopAction
    An action when the player visits the shop, it displays a submenu with a list of items with their corresponding price, player can use the coins in their coin pouch to purchase the item listed in the shop if the player has enough coins.
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    Wheat
    A type of food dropped when crop is harvested.
    Zombie
    A Zombie has two intrinsic weapons, namely punches and bites.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
    ZombieClub
    A weapon that is crafted from a zombie arm.
    ZombieMace
    A weapon that is crafted from a zombie leg.

    IdentityCapability  
    ZombieCapability
